'''''Vinyar Tengwar 13''''' is the thirteenth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|12|14}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "The Death of Glorfindel" — Patrick H. Wynne
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "Mythcon XXI: A Review" — Bruce Leonard
* "The Way to 'Revived' Elvish: A Cornish Model?" — Alexei Kondratiev
* "A Survey of Ring Poem Translations" — Jorge Quiñónez
* "''Essitalmar'': Star-struck" (column) — Tom Loback
* "Transitions in Translations: 'Edition Shifting' in the German Hobbit, Part 1" (column) — Arden R. Smith
